Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier door problem on the train at 47th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier door problem on the train at 47th.

 Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.


Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 35th
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 35th due to a mechanical problem on the train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 35th due to a mechanical problem on the train. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
